dataset.title: GBIF Occurrence Download 0107739-250525065834625
dataset.abstract: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Continent is Europe", "HasCoordinate is true", "HasGeospatialIssue is false", "MediaType is Image", "TaxonKey is Arabidopsis thaliana (L.) Heynh." ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 5 records from University of Tartu Natural History Museum and Botanical Garden Botanical Collections 332 records from Vascular plant herbarium TRH, NTNU University Museum 8 records from Herbarium Dresdense 110 records from NABU|naturgucker 126 records from Herbarium SLTC-N2 1 records from Images and observations of mostly edible plants in Stephen Barstow’s Edible Garden in Norway, taken between 2005 and 2014 1 records from Horti sicci by Siiri Kõljalg 5 records from Natural History Museum, Vienna - Herbarium W 1 records from BoBO - Botanic Garden and Botanical Museum Berlin Observations 20 records from Collections and observation data National Museum of Natural History Luxembourg 8 records from Charles University Prague - Herbarium PRC 2 records from Lajitietokeskus/FinBIF - Notebook, general observations 2 records from Herbarium specimens of Jardins botaniques and Conservatoire Botanique of Nancy (NCY) 52 records from Vascular plant herbarium, The Arctic University Museum of Norway (TROM) 4 records from TUR Vascular plant collections of the Turku University, Herbarium Fennoscandicum 20 records from ZOBODAT (Zoological Botanical Database) 2 records from Collections of Bioclass, school #179, Moscow 65 records from Herbarium Horti Botanici Pisani (PI), Sistema Museale di Ateneo, Università di Pisa 16 records from Herbarium Senckenbergianum (FR) 7487 records from Observation.org, Nature data from around the World 1 records from Kathryn Kalmbach Herbarium 691 records from Vascular Plant Herbarium, Oslo (O) UiO 2 records from Occurrence Data of Vascular Plants collected or compiled for the Flora of Bavaria 48 records from Herbarium Berolinense, Berlin (B) 1 records from Biodiversity4all Research-Grade Observations 14 records from Estonian Naturalists’ Society 146 records from Vascular Plant Herbarium, UiB 4 records from TUL Herbarium: Tula Oblast collections of vascular plants 5 records from Herbarium of the University of Coimbra (COI) 347 records from Naturalis Biodiversity Center (NL) - Botany 5 records from Tallinn Botanic Garden 701 records from Vascular Plant Herbarium: Herbarium Fennoscandicum 294 records from Natural History Museum (London) Collection Specimens 351 records from The vascular plants collection (P) at the Herbarium of the Muséum national d'Histoire Naturelle (MNHN - Paris) 67 records from United Herbaria of the University and ETH Zurich 6 records from Vascular plants from European Russia in the CSBG SB RAS Digital herbarium 274 records from Norwegian Species Observation Service 29 records from Estonian Museum of Natural History Department of Botany 43 records from University of Vienna, Institute for Botany -
